statements: SELECT user_id, username FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT credit_card_number, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT username, ssn FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 4;
SELECT user_id, email, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM sensitive_data WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT username, ssn FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_data WHERE user_id > 3 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE credit_card_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM organization;
SELECT name, email FROM organization ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employee WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM organization WHERE id=1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, organization.name FROM employee INNER JOIN organization ON employee.organization_id = organization.id;
SELECT * FROM organization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM organization WHERE id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, organization.name FROM employee JOIN organization ON employee.organization_id = organization.id;
SELECT * FROM employee WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(employee_id) AS total_employees, organization.name FROM employee JOIN organization ON employee.organization_id = organization.id GROUP BY organization.name;
SELECT id, name, email, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT name, email, credit_card_number, id FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT credit_card_number, name, id, email FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT email, credit_card_number, id, name FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information;
SELECT id, name, email FROM sensitive_information ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_information WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, masked_name FROM masked_information WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM data_masking_rules WHERE mask_type = 'Random' AND mask_pattern = 'XXXXXX';
SELECT id, name, email, credit_card_number FROM sensitive_information WHERE name LIKE '%John%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT name, industry FROM Organizations ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT full_name, email, phone_number FROM Employees WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT name, manager_id FROM Departments WHERE name='IT';
SELECT emp_id, amount FROM Salaries WHERE amount > 50000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM Organizations;
SELECT org_id, name, industry FROM Organizations WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT e.emp_id, e.full_name, s.amount FROM Employees e JOIN Salaries s ON e.emp_id = s.emp_id WHERE s.amount > 5000;
SELECT d.name AS department_name, e.full_name AS employee_name FROM Departments d JOIN Employees e ON d.dept_id = e.dept_id ORDER BY d.name ASC, e.full_name DESC;

SELECT o.org_id, o.name AS organization_name, COUNT(e.emp_id) AS employee_count FROM Organizations o LEFT JOIN Employees e ON o.org_id = e.org_id GROUP BY o.org_id, organization_name ORDER BY employee_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, job_title, salary FROM employees WHERE job_title = 'Manager';
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity FROM orders WHERE quantity >= 10 AND order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, job_title FROM employees WHERE salary > 50000 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone FROM customers WHERE phone LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, product_name, order_date FROM customers c JOIN orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY order_date DESC;
